help-file.title: JUDGEMENT
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <room> Aggressive: Yes Cumulative: No Duration: Instantaneous Type of spell: Generic
"Judgement" calls down holy retribution down upon everyone and everything in the same room unfortunate enough to be evil or undead. This mighty spell has a chance of incapacitating its victims in a variety of unpleasant manners. Victims that are sufficiently lower level than the attacking Paladin suffer more dire consequences.
